name: Escape Puzzle
description:
Description:

The story revolves around a highly cunning robot trying to escape from an unknown and mysterious place, and to escape from this place, it must overcome challenges and the puzzles is difficult and confusing, and your role in the game is to help him solve puzzles to escape and you will have completed the game and helped the robot to escape

                                                                         System Requirement: 

Os: Linux, Windows:7/8/8.1/10

Ram: 2GB

Stockage: 2GB

GPU: GeForce GTX 650 and above
